Uses of Interface
org.joone.edit.NetStorageFormat

Packages that use NetStorageFormat
org.joone.edit   
 

Uses of NetStorageFormat in org.joone.edit
 

Classes in org.joone.edit that implement NetStorageFormat
 class StandardNetStorageFormat
          A StandardNetStorageFormat is a straight-forward file format to store and restore NeuralNets.
 

Methods in org.joone.edit that return NetStorageFormat
 NetStorageFormat NetStorageFormatManager.getDefaultStorageFormat()
          Return the NetStorageFormat which is used as selected file format in a javax.swing.JFileChooser
 NetStorageFormat NetStorageFormatManager.findStorageFormat(javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter findFileFilter)
          Find a NetStorageFormat that can be used according to a FileFilter to store a NeuralNet in a file or restore it from a file respectively.
 

Methods in org.joone.edit with parameters of type NetStorageFormat
 void NetStorageFormatManager.addStorageFormat(NetStorageFormat newStorageFormat)
          Add a NetStorageFormat that should be supported by this NetStorageFormatManager.
 void NetStorageFormatManager.removeStorageFormat(NetStorageFormat oldStorageFormat)
          Remove a StorageFormat that should no longer be supported by this StorageFormatManager.
 boolean NetStorageFormatManager.containsStorageFormat(NetStorageFormat checkStorageFormat)
          Test, whether a NetStorageFormat is supported by this StorageFormat
 void NetStorageFormatManager.setDefaultStorageFormat(NetStorageFormat newDefaultStorageFormat)
          Set a NetStorageFormat as the default storage format which is selected in a javax.swing.JFileChooser.
protected  void JoonEdit.saveNeuralNet(NetStorageFormat storeFormat, java.lang.String file)
          Save a NeuralNet in a file
